metadata.title: CVE-2021-33582 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Cyrus IMAP before 3.4.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (multiple-minute daemon hang) via input that is mishandled during hash-table interaction. Because there are many insertions into a single bucket, strcmp becomes slow. This is fixed in 3.4.2, 3.2.8, and 3.0.16.

criterions.comment: cyrus-imapd package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
